"It's kinda hard to explain..." she says looking back down at the necklace. It's glowing a bright reed blaze.

"Well explain it! What am I?!"

"You're a spirit," Tina states, "and I have complete control over you."

You look around and try to dart for the door, but something is wrong. You can't move! You're stuck in mid-air! You start squirming around as if trying to break out of your ethereal jail cell, but it just won't work. You grow tired and give up, and you notice that your sister is laughing at you.

"Like I said, I have complete control over you," she says while chuckling. She starts to walk out of the room, and without any choice you follow her. It's like you were being dragged by some unknown force.

"What do you want, I'll do anything! Just, please, make me normal again!" you beg. Tina ignores you.

"I can place you into any person or object anywhere in the world, and then take you back just like that! Oh, the possibilities...." she says as if talking to herself. You start to get nervous. You can't imagine being someone else, or even SOMETHING else.

"Please don't! Put me back in my own body!"

"But, that's no fun! There's so much we can do right now!" You watch helplessly as your sister appears to have an idea.

"Let's test this really quick, I promise I'll bring you right back, okay?"

"Put me ba---" You suddenly can't talk. You can't even see. What happened?

"Can you hear me? If you can, think yes." Tina says in a wispy voice.

"Yes," you think not expecting it to work. Suddenly you regain your sight. But, sadly you are still in your ghost form. You look around and see Tina with a big sinister grin on her face.

"That went well," she whispers.

"What happened?!" you yell.

"I placed you, or should I say your soul, into a lamp. But, objects are no fun. I won't you to have flesh again!" She clasps her hands together and starts laughing menacingly. "And I know just the person... I'm going to place you into someone we are both familiar with, but do me a favor please? Send me a selfie when you get to your 'destination,' okay? Oh, and at least try to look happy in the picture, or there might be consequences. See ya!"

"Wait, please, NO!" But, it was too late, you feel yourself being sucked towards the necklace, like a vortex. You feel powerless. Suddenly, you lose consciousness, and you slip into darkness.

You wake feeling groggy, but you aren't lying on the ground like you usually are when you wake up. Weird. You look around. Clearly you are not home anymore, but where are you?

1131.content:
You are sitting straight up, and you see flashes of something going past you on your left. There was some older sounding music being played. You look to your left, and you see a woman. She's driving, you're in a car! But, who is that woman? Oh! It's your Aunt Jennifer!

This is what she looks like: http://www.taracousineau.com/wp-content/...

You know her as Aunt Jennifer, but she really isn't your aunt. She's actually one of your mom's best friends. They were college roommates for four years. Both her and your mom are 42. What were you doing in the car with her though?

"This is so weird," you think to yourself. Then you remembered, Tina wanted you to take a selfie of your new self and send it to her. Whoever this is must have her number, since you both apparently knew her. You look down and see something very unfamiliar. You see two mounds popping out of your chest. Yep, you're a woman. You feel so weird, being someone else. You notice there is a purse sitting on your lap, so you decide to snoop around in it to try and find this lady's phone to take a selfie. You start digging around.

"You okay?" Jennifer asks.

You just keep digging. You find some lipstick; a whole makeup kit for that matter; some hand sanitizer, a sewing kit, and, finally, a phone, an iPhone. It seems as if you've seen this phone before.You power it up, no lock screen, and open up the camera. You select the front camera option, and then you are absolutely stunned by what you see. You see a 42 year old blonde woman who looks similar to you. It's your mother.

"Oh my god," you say quietly, but loud enough for Jennifer to hear.

"What's wrong? You're acting weird," she says, stating the obvious.

"Oh, uh, nothing. Nothing at all." it is so weird to feel yourself talking, but hear someone else's voice. "This is sooooo weird," you think.

"Wait, why does Tina want me to take a selfie?" you question to yourself.

"What?" Jennifer asks with a quizzical look on her face. "You are being so strange." She turns up the music. You recognize it as Billy Joel, your mom's favorite.

You wonder again why Tina wants you to take a selfie. What if you don't? What if you do? Should you obey your sister?

info.brief_description: An ancient relic allows the wearer put one persons soul into another body or object.
info.description:
In this story you’re just an average high school senior with two younger siblings, Tina and Emily. Tina is a sophomore and Emily is in the first grade. Your parents are divorced so you all live with your mom.

Until one day Tina is looking around in the attic and finds a piece of jewelry that belonged to your grandmother. And it turns out to be much more then cheap costume jewelry, it was actually an enchanted relic that allows the wearer to manipulate souls or to be more specific move them. With it a person could extract the soul from one body and place it into someone or something else.

So that means someone’s soul could be transferred into the body of a family member, a friend, an enemy, an object, you get the idea

For now I’m not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
